event: transferred to a tertiary care hospital
occlusion of the distal left-dominant posterior descending artery
transferred to cardiac intensive care unit
onset of polymorphic ventricular tachycardia storm
admission blood cultures grew methicillin-sensitive Staphylococcus aureus
multifocal suppuration of the lower interventricular septum
posterior descending artery exhibited acute bacterial vasculitis
